data.a: When we first launched, Forest.io NFTs were minted on the OpenSea marketplace. But as we release more NFTs to our exclusive members, you will be able to trade and exchange tokens on multiple other cryptocurrency platforms.

data.q: How can I buy Forest.io NFT?
data.a: There is only one way to purchase our Forest Congo NFT, and it’s here at this link: https://opensea.io/collection/forestcongo

data.q: What payment methods do you accept for a Forest.io NFT?
data.a: All payments to purchase your Forest Congo NFT can be made using OpenSea.io on the ETH blockchain. Whatever Wallet system you choose to use, we can accept payment. Whether it’s MetaMask, CoinBase, or others, you can easily purchase your Forest Congo NFT.

data.q: Can I pay for my NFT with cryptocurrency?
data.a: Yes, we accept Ethereum (ETH). It’s the only cryptocurrency you can currently use to buy one of our vivid, purpose-driven NFTs

data.q: How can I sell my NFTs?
data.a: You are welcome to sell your Forest.io NFTs on the OpenSea marketplace.

data.q: What happens when I sell an NFT?
data.a: If you choose to sell your Forest Congo NFT, you’ll lose the chance to exchange any further NFT for our upcoming Forest.io Token.

Forest.io is a cryptocurrency company with one simple yet massive goal—to use the proceeds from the sale of our NFTs to protect part of the rainforest worldwide.We’re committed to helping countries with vast rainforests that don’t have enough resources to monitor illegal logging and other problems. Through our satellite data and Forest.io algorithms, we believe we can help reduce the cost, improve the solution, and thus help humanity save the planet Earth.
